original_text: But if it bears thorns and thistles, it is worthless and near to being cursed, and its end is to be burned.
korean_text: 만일 가시와 엉겅퀴를 내면 버림을 당하고 저주함에 가까워 그 마지막은 불사름이 되리라

sentences.original_text: But if it bears thorns and thistles,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만일 그것이 가시와 엉겅퀴를 낳으면,

sentences.original_text: it is worthless and near to being cursed,
and its end is to be burned.
